title: ditech Wins LendingTree's Top 10 Customer Satisfaction Award
text:
ditech Wins LendingTree's Top 10 Customer Satisfaction Award August 11, 2015 09:57 ET | Source: ditech 
FORT WASHINGTON, Pa., Aug. 11, 2015 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Ditech Mortgage Corp ("ditech") announced today that it has been named by LendingTreeÂ® as winner of the Top 10 Customer Satisfaction Award, designating the company as one of the most highly ranked lenders in the second quarter of 2015. 
Based on customer reviews, the Top Ten list is developed weighing average review ratings and the volume of reviews. Customers rate lenders on mortgage rates, fees and closing costs, responsiveness, customer service and overall experience. 
"After reintroducing the ditech brand to the market only a year ago, we're thrilled to be recognized as a top lender by LendingTree," said Rich Smith, Chief Marketing Officer at ditech. "Amidst what can be a very confusing time for consumers, we strive to create a seamless and pleasant experience, helping our customers to fully understand the home buying or refinance process and feel confident in their decision to work with us." 
LendingTree's Top Ten Customer Rated Lenders list is based on ratings and reviews filed between April 1, 2015 and June 30, 2015. 
About ditech 
Ditech Mortgage Corp ("ditech") is a well-known home lender. Headquartered in Fort Washington, PA, the company provides residential mortgage products through a team of home loan specialists who are easily accessible by phone (1-800-700-9212), online and in-person. The company's Correspondent Lending division has a legacy of building successful business solutions and partners with 600+ financial institutions nationwide, providing capital market expertise and financial stability. ditech is owned by Walter Investment Management Corp., a leading business solutions provider focused on generating recurring, fee-based revenues from an "asset-light" platform.   www.ditech.com .
